post.body: whr ya off to bro?? n how was ur trip to bglore?
yeah mach - watched Matrix again, got inspired all over again - what an Awwwwwwesome movie man! tripping on the trilogy again :)
looks like someone s soaking up ALL of delhi in a single weekend! have fun :)
nothing that a peg or two wont cure!!
hahah - wish!! - this is with people who think they are Gods!
dude - my con calls range from 5 hrs to 7.5 hrs on average! enjoyyyyyy
same here bro!! btw when r u in bglore?
haha - looks like they have more job oppotunites than we do my friend!!
quiet the question of the moment! r u thinking of booking it?
enhancing english skills is it??
as opposed to aeroplanes in other airports ??
wow - sounds like an interesting movie - infact if u can try n get the collection of 3 movies, lemme know !
way to go bro!
how was Eagle Eye? i watched "the day the earth stood still" last night - ok movie not a "must watch"
hahaha look who s talking ;)
undersea cables were the culprit apparently... atleast this weekend!
yeah man - net sucks this weekend !
really? does it make it a better phone :P
hang in there dude.. it ll only get better from now on!
Clover Fields Rocks!!
High on Matrix again - watching the Trilogy all over again!
Remember : There IS no Spoon.....
Nietzche was right - Tragedy is reaffirmation of Life .... Look at ALL the "protest/anti establishment/glorifying common man/singing Arm ...
Crazy Monday at work! but its getting over in the next 1.5 hours!
Sunday brunch @ Pongal!!! Whatanice!!!!!!!!
Salary Day.... There's tht special feeling in the air!
Mumbai Reeling... Bangkok shuddering... Mexico in the midst of its worst drug related war.... dang!!! Newspapers have turned into Horror ...
Exploring the new office!
Hungry!!!!
New Office from today... Back at Mantri!
With 6 million users breaking the law, its not the people who must change, it is the law that must be changed.
Happppy New Year Everyone!
"We come into this world Wet, Cold & Terrified... And then it gets Worse" - read this somewhere but How true!
Testing update with Ping.fm again!
Waiting for Saturday Night BBQ!!!
How do i get thru the next 5 days? well - 4.5 to be exact...
Making momos.... hope they turn out tasty!
Lazy Saturday AN - after Pongal for Breakfast n lunch on the way - what bliss!!!
Will we EVER get true broadband??? 30 hours to download a movie is RIDICULOUS!
